ProfileList.Title: Primary Care Provider
ProfileList.Description: Allows your primary care provider to read your record, update and add documents, and send you secure messages.
ProfileList.Subject: Person

ProfileList.Title: Family Member
ProfileList.Description: Allows a family member to read and annotate your medical documents, and send you secure messages.
ProfileList.Subject: Person

ProfileList.Title: School
ProfileList.Description: Allows a school to read your immunization records and contact information, as well as send you secure messages.
ProfileList.Subject: Service

ProfileList.Title: Subscription Agent
ProfileList.Description: Allows a subscription agent to read your subscription and contact information, and add or update documents from its external database.
ProfileList.Subject: Service

ProfileList.Title: Patient
ProfileList.Description: Allows your patient to communicate with you and see your contact information.
ProfileList.Subject: Person

ProfileList.Title: Research Administrator
ProfileList.Description: Allows an administrator to help manage your record as part of a research project.
ProfileList.Subject: Person

ProfileList.Title: Friend
ProfileList.Description: Allows a friend to send you secure messages and read your contact information.
ProfileList.Subject: Person

RuleList.Title: Add Annotations
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add annotations.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update All Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update all document types.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Clinical Note Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your clinical notes.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Contact Information Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your contact information.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Demographics Information Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your demographic information.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Immunization Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your immunization documents.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Laboratory Result Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your laboratory result documents.

RuleList.Title: Add Metadata
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your metadata.

RuleList.Title: Add and Update Survey Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to add and update your surveys.

RuleList.Title: Deny Reads of Sensitive Documents
RuleList.Description: Denies read access to your credentials, actor attributes, and policies.

RuleList.Title: Deny Writes of Sensitive Documents
RuleList.Description: Denies write access to your credentials, actor attributes, and policies.

RuleList.Title: Query Record
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to query your record.

RuleList.Title: Read All Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view all your documents.

RuleList.Title: View Clinical Note Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your clinical notes.

RuleList.Title: View Contact Information Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your contact information.

RuleList.Title: View Demographics Information Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your demographic information.

RuleList.Title: View Immunization Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your immunization documents.

RuleList.Title: View Laboratory Result Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your laboratory result documents.

RuleList.Title: View Messages
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your messages.

RuleList.Title: View Metadata
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your metadata.

RuleList.Title: View Susbcription Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your subscription documents.

RuleList.Title: View Survey Documents
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to view your surveys.

RuleList.Title: Send Messages
RuleList.Description: Grants permission to send you messages.
